duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide first-line customer support by assisting shoppers, answering questions, and helping with the check-out process.
Stock and display merchandise in accordance with Company merchandising standards.
Follow all Company safety procedures and work with an awareness of safety.
Work independently with minimal direction and follow the daily to-do list.
Clean up spills, floors, shelves, displays, and bathrooms.
Perform additional duties as assigned by Management or Supervisors.
